This will become fhir3.healthintersections.com.au shortly; it's running the current build

(I'm migrating to a new server on a different EC2 tier after consulting with an amazon sales guy)
this new server introduces a new idea - it's running a combined snomed release- a merge of SCT AU and US into a single reasoning space.
we don't know whether that's viable - meeting with IHTSDO about it today
